title: Love, Honor and Obey
description: Fired from her job, Kiera Combs is angry. To get back at her boss she makes him lose over a million dollars by calling clients and telling them how they could get out of paying their debt to him. Drake Hemsgate is not impressed, so as punishment he black lists her name everywhere so nobody is willing to give her a job.Desperate for him to clear her name, she finds herself begging him to take mercy on her, after losing everything she owned.In a twist of fate, Drake takes pity on Keira, they fall in love and live happily ever after...or so she thought.Warning: This book contains material of sex and submission, violence and dark erotica. It is recommended for audiences over the age of 18. If this material offends please refrain from reading.
author: E.L. Beth
